title: Work
author: Sean Monahan
description: A selection of projects Sean has worked on.
headline: A selection of projects I've been involved with.
copy: From desktop applications, to mobile games and experiments these are the projects I'm particularly fond of.

items.title: Funko
items.blurb: Subscription storefront featuring collectibles based on Marvel heroes.

items.title: Elastic Suite
items.blurb: A collection of custom branded tools for business-to-business sales.

items.title: VIP Nation
items.blurb: Premium concert ticket packages and experiences.

items.title: Boss Beatdown
items.blurb: Classic 2D fighting action for Xbox 360, Xbox One and the Web.

items.title: Infiniti
items.blurb: A Rich Interactive Advertisement featured at the Concours d'Elegance in Pebble Beach.

items.title: Swordpath
items.blurb: Slice and dice a relentless robot army with nothing but your fingertips.

items.title: Zombie Playground
items.blurb: Website and forum design and development for the 3D action, online battle RPG.

items.title: Shibashiba
items.blurb: Take control of three shibas for 40 levels of running, jumping, sliding and dashing action.

items.title: GnipGnop
items.blurb: An experiment in creating a browser-based, multi-device networked multiplayer game that runs off a single code base on client and server.

items.title: Deathliest Fighter
items.blurb: Local multiplayer arena combat for 2 to 4 people on Mac and Windows.

items.title: Beat Boost
items.blurb: Ride waves across levels directly generated from the music.

items.title: AIRPad
items.blurb: Standardized gamepad API for Mac and Windows.

items.title: Framed
items.blurb: An Actionscript library for exporting MovieClips and the Flash Stage to PNG sequences for games and other applications.
